subject: new server for ftp.cl.debian.org
body:
Dear list,

I'm happy to report that we have chipped in and bought a new HP Proliant
ML110 G4 SATA server that will replace the old ftp.cl.debian.org.

We expect to be soon on-line again.

Ricardo Yanez


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
